author: Ashton_Giant
title: Quirky but useless !
review:
VIP set that comes free when spending over £200 at Lego.com in November 2020.

I didn't actually know what this was going to be as such - thought it might have been a buildable storage brick, but no, it's a Lego brick made of Lego with a stand, that doesn't serve any other purpose but to display. 

It's a very easy build as the brick is hollow and because of this, it can't be used as a quirky paperweight.

Had it had hinges or studs and smooth plates on top, then it could have been a storage brick for smaller items. 

Alas, neither of these were the case, so it doesn't really serve any purpose and I'd much rather use the space this would use up for a more interesting model ! 
 

For me, I'll probably either use it for spare pieces or keep it for a few years before selling it on (when it's worth thousands of ££££ [NOT])
